places.title: Museo Nacional del Virreinato
places.address: Plaza Hidalgo 99, Centro, Tepotzotlán, Edo. México, Mexico
places.description: A historical museum showcasing Mexico’s colonial past, featuring religious artifacts, paintings, and a beautiful baroque-style church.

places.title: Arcos del Sitio
places.address: Arcos del Sitio, Tepotzotlán, Edo. México, Mexico
places.description: A stunning 18th-century aqueduct with impressive arches, ideal for hiking and enjoying panoramic views of the surrounding landscape.

places.title: Parque Ecológico Xochitla
places.address: Carretera Circunvalación s/n, Tepotzotlán, Edo. México, Mexico
places.description: A green oasis offering gardens, lakes, bike trails, and family-friendly activities like kayaking, camping, and interactive workshops.

places.title: Plaza Virreinal
places.description: A charming colonial-style square filled with local artisans, food vendors, and cultural events throughout the year.

places.title: Centro Histórico de Tepotzotlán
places.description: A vibrant area with cobblestone streets, colorful buildings, traditional restaurants, and historical landmarks.

places.title: Parque Estatal Sierra de Tepotzotlán
places.address: Sierra de Tepotzotlán, Edo. México, Mexico
places.description: A natural reserve perfect for hiking, birdwatching, and camping, with breathtaking mountain views and waterfalls.

places.title: Los Portales de Tepotzotlán
places.description: An iconic row of arches housing cafes, shops, and traditional food stalls, offering a perfect place to relax and enjoy local cuisine.

places.title: Casa de Cultura Tepotzotlán
places.address: Av. Insurgentes 1, Centro, Tepotzotlán, Edo. México, Mexico
places.description: A cultural center hosting art exhibitions, workshops, and live performances, celebrating local traditions and creativity.

places.title: Balneario El Chinguirito
places.address: Camino al Cerrito s/n, Tepotzotlán, Edo. México, Mexico
places.description: A family-friendly water park with pools, slides, and picnic areas, offering a refreshing escape on hot days.

places.title: Mercado Municipal de Tepotzotlán
places.description: A bustling market where visitors can taste local delicacies, buy handmade crafts, and experience authentic Mexican culture.
